name: Murders at the Manor
description:
Story:

You've been invited to attend a fancy party to find...  THE KILLER!

Every 10 seconds, the power flickers, and from the shroud of darkness they will strike. It's your task to figure out who the killer is before it is too late!

Controls:

Use the mouse to select a suspect, and to arrest them. Clicking anywhere else will deselect them.

Hints:

The killer will prioritize nearby targets, but will shoot one at random if nobody is nearby. You have three attempts to find the killer, but don't wait too long. If the song reaches the end, it's game over!

Credits:

- Justin Law: Game design, Programming, UI design, and Story

- Chazi Martin: Game design, Graphics, Music, and Sound FX

All graphics were created from scratch using photoshop.

All sound effects, except for the fireplace were made from scratch using Adobe Audition.

Fonts are Magnolia and Calligraphy from 1001 Free Fonts.

Fireplace came from Zapsplat.
